title: The Wall
resume: Spanish version of the game show in which correct answers cause a green ball to fall down the wall adding the value of the slot to the players' winning total and a missed question causes an ominous red ball to fall and deduct the value from the team's total. Teammates have to work together to build a huge cash prize.

Teammates have to work together to build a huge cash prize.
